title: naming-conventions
text: Fisheries identified fsh followed number - fsh1, fsh2. Trawl survey functions start ts_, longline survey functions start lls. function starts q_ database query connect either AKFIN AFSC database raw data. Since queries may specific species region, stand alone query “wrapper functions” provided. functions named region species la goa_nork() Gulf Alaska northern rockfish.

title: naming-conventions
text: data file name ends _data.csv raw data originates database little filtering. Query functions place files data/raw folder. user provided files needed (age error, length bins, VAST) stored data/user_input folder .csv files.

title: setup
text: gfdata package can installed github : consistent directory format probably important aspect package. first function creates number directories within R project folder. setup organized year within folder. setup() function creates following folders files: can updated year. create duplication folders given year SSC accepted model can added last assessment current year’s “base model”. creates duplication folders current year Note fortunate stock years partial assessments setup() function switch (off_yr). switch changes folders/files loaded year. provides raw folder updates catch data (design-based survey estimates), output folder cleaned catch data, SARA folder annual reporting data, user_input folder storing updates VAST, etc. may used assessment might make way SAFE.
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("BenWilliams-NOAA/gfdata") library(gfdata) # setup folders -----  setup(2020) project |__2020     |__data         |__models         |    |__ageage         |    |     AGEAGE.tpl         |    |__allometric         |    |     allometric.tpl         |    |__length_sd         |    |     lengthSD.tpl         |    |__VBL         |    |      VBL.tpl         |    |__wVBL         |    |      wVBL.tpl         |    |      lvb.ctl         |         |__output         |__raw         |__SARA         |__user_input # setup folders -----  setup(2021) project |__2020 |   |__data |       |__models |       |    |__ageage |       |    |     AGEAGE.tpl |       |    |__allometric |       |    |     allometric.tpl |       |    |__length_sd |       |    |     lengthSD.tpl |       |    |__VBL |       |    |      VBL.tpl |       |    |__wVBL |       |    |      wVBL.tpl |       |    |      lvb.ctl |       | |       |__output |       |__raw |       |__SARA |       |__user_input |__2021     |__data         |__models         |    |__ageage         |    |     AGEAGE.tpl         |    |__allometric         |    |     allometric.tpl         |    |__length_sd         |    |     lengthSD.tpl         |    |__VBL         |    |      VBL.tpl         |    |__wVBL         |    |      wVBL.tpl         |    |      lvb.ctl         |         |__output         |__raw         |__SARA         |__user_input accepted_model(base_year = 2020, base_model = "m18.2b", year = 2021) project |__2020     |__data     |__base    # last accepted model     |__m18.2a  # model variant a     |__m18.2b  # model variant b |__2021     |__data     |__base   # dupication of m18.2b         |__ all model files # setup folders -----  setup(2021, off_yr = TRUE) project |__2020 |   |__data |       |__models |       |    |__ageage |       |    |     AGEAGE.tpl |       |    |__allometric |       |    |     allometric.tpl |       |    |__length_sd |       |    |     lengthSD.tpl |       |    |__VBL |       |    |      VBL.tpl |       |    |__wVBL |       |    |      wVBL.tpl |       |    |      lvb.ctl |       | |       |__output |       |__raw |       |__SARA |       |__user_input |__2021     |__data         |__output         |__raw         |__SARA         |__user_input

what: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
title: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
text: copy base model files, also add "base_model.txt" file identifies model used

title: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
code: accepted_model(base_year, base_model, year, folder = NULL)

title: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
text: base_year year base model base_model name base model (folder name) year current year folder base model different location groundfishr structure looking

title: copy the previous SSC accepted model as the new
code: if (FALSE) { accepted_model(base_year = 2020, base_model = "m18.2b", year = 2021) }

what: gfdata: Data queries for accessing the AKFIN and AFSC databases. — gfdata-package
title: gfdata: Data queries for accessing the AKFIN and AFSC databases. — gfdata-package
text: package provides folder structure SQL queries accessing AKFIN AFSC databases support fishery stock assessments. Additionally, archived data held/provided maintain consistency across assessments/assessment authors.

title: gfdata: Data queries for accessing the AKFIN and AFSC databases. — gfdata-package
text: Maintainer: Benjamin Williams ben.williams@noaa.gov

title: query prohibited species catch estimate — q_psc
text: year assessment year trip_target 'p' = pollock-mid, 'b' = pollock-bottom, 'x' = rex, 'h' = shallow flats, 'k' = rockfish, 'w' = arrowtooth, 'c' = pcod, '' = halibut area goa bsai save save file designated folder akfin database query

title: query prohibited species catch estimate — q_psc
code: if (FALSE) {  akfin = DBI::dbConnect(odbc::odbc(), "akfin", UID = akfin_user, PWD = akfin_pwd) q_psc(year=2022, trip_target="k", area="goa", afkin, save=FALSE)  }
